post:
**vServer.site KVM vServer**
Since 2 weeks our new KVM Clusters in Düsseldorf ready. The KVM virutal machines hosted on Nodes, there are connected to multiple 10G to our Core Switches. Now are all vServer with pure SSD Harddrives

**General Functions**
KVM Full Virtualisation
Start, Stop, Reinstall over Control Panel
Rescue System
Add own ISO
1x IPv4 + /64 IPv6 (PTR can change self)

**Datacenter**
Düsseldorf, Germany

**Available Images**
Debian 8,9,10
CentOS 6,7,8
Ubuntu 16.04,18.04,19.04
Fedora, Suse...

KVM Mini: 1 vCPU Core, 1 GB RAM, 5 GB SSD, 1Gbit/s Port, 1 TB Traffic inkl.
Price: € 1,50 per month
https://cp.vserver.site/cart.php?a=add&pid=117

KVM Ultra: 2 vCPU Core, 2 GB RAM, 10 GB SSD, 1Gbit/s Port, 1 TB Traffic inkl.
Price: € 3,00 per month
https://cp.vserver.site/cart.php?a=add&pid=118

KVM Large: 2 vCPU Core, 4 GB RAM, 20 GB SSD, 1Gbit/s Port, 2 TB Traffic inkl.
Price: € 5,99 per month
https://cp.vserver.site/cart.php?a=add&pid=119

**Promotion**
Save now 10% when you pay Semi-Annually or Anually. Enter Couponcode "LET10LONG" in order.

See other Levels on our Website https://vserver.site/de/vserver_kvm_duesseldorf.html?utm_source=LET.
